programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff offers a unique behind-the-scenes glimpse of the final British Touring Car Championship race of the year as Jason attempts to clinch the championship, Vicki reveals everything you need to know about Renault's sexy new convertible the Wind.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this episode of Fifth Gear Tiff Needell visits northern Sweden for a very chilly rally challenge. He has just a few hours to learn the skills of racing on sheet ice before he takes on a rally champion over a treacherous rally stage.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson learns the skills needed to drive in the Special Forces, from former Royal Marine sniper Aldo Kane.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell travel to Romania to sample some of the car culture there. This includes driving some massive off-roaders, meeting a local classic car restorer, and racing a motorsport mad Mayor up the streets of his town.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason tests a brand new model from British track-car specialists Westfield. Tiff has rounded up the newest American muscle cars. Guest presenter Robert Llewellyn heads to Portugal to test a revolutionary electric car from Nissan.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson heads to Monaco in Maserati's brand new GranCabrio, Jason Plato tries to hit 200mph in the Noble M600 supercar and Tiff Needell joins Jonny Smith in attempting the impossible - a road trip in an electric car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason drives Porsche's newest, rawest car, the 911 GT3 RS. Jonny finds out if the brand-new, high-tech Audi A8 is good enough to keep the big saloon market alive. Vicki looks at Mercedes new luxury drop top, the E-Class Cabriolet.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests the Mercedes Vito X or the VW Transporter Sportline on the track to find out which is quickest. Jonny embarks on the 600 mile transcontinental trip in the BMW 635d. Tom drives the ultimate 4x4, the 12 tonne, 10 foot tall Unimog.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson jets off to Portugal to drive the new Mazda MX5. It's the best selling sportscar in the world, but have Mazda fixed something that wasn't broken.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tests Ford's Focus ST170 and concludes that it's a good car in a refined sort of way but no rival for the current hot hatch favourite, Honda's Civic Type-R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear Quentin Willson and Tiff Needell stage a massive head-on collision by piloting two remote controlled cars into each other at 60 mph.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason head for the racetrack in the KTM X-Bow and Lotus 2-Eleven. Jonny investigates the smarter and apparently plusher qualities to be found in the latest Golf. Tom conducts a shocking crash test which is essential viewing for all families.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out if the Lotus Elise S is the best track car for novices - by giving the keys to her sister; Le Mans winner Guy Smith races the fastest van on sale today.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell travels to California to test Nissan's new 350Z sports car. Is it a worthy successor to the company's 1970s 240Z? And is it as good to drive as it looks? Tiff thinks so.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out how quick the police are on a racing track; Jonny tests small economy cars to find out if they can climb one of Britain's biggest hills; Sarah tries to out manoeuvre Jason in an articulated lorry and Tiff drives the new BMW M3.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: An exclusive insight into America's most glamorous supercar club, based in an underground bunker at a private jet airport, Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race the BMW M3 against the Audi RS4.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato helps a lottery winner choose a new supercar, Tiff Needell road tests the new Jaguar XK on the best road in the world, and Tom Ford meets Jenson Button at the Geneva Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell drives Suzuki's hot hatch, the Swift Sport; Tom Ford drives the awesome Aussie supercar, the Vauxhall Monaro; Vicki Butler-Henderson fulfils a lifetime ambition and drives a racing truck.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits two almost identical Porsche Caymans. Jonny is enjoying some Spanish sun in the brand new Audi A5 cabriolet. Tim investigates the accuracy of the combined economy cycle. Jason helps Matthew Pinsent find his perfect car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff heads to Anglesey for not one but two Shoot-Outs, the Porsche Cayenne goes head to head with the BMW X5 and the Renault Clio takes on the Honda Civic.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff take part in another famous Fifth Gear dogfight on Quad Bikes. Jonny attends an auction of DVLA number plates. Vicki tests the Alfa Romeo Mito the new supermini that could finally wipe the smile off the faces of legions of Mini owners

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell sets out to see whether it's possible to drive along the A537 from Macclesfield to Buxton, the most dangerous road in Britain, safely in the first Porsche Cayman in the country.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom tests the chic rival to the MINI the Fiat 500; we find out if fuel additives really work by testing four leading brands; Jonny and Tom build and test an armoured Rolls-Royce with live ammunition and Tiff drives the Ferrari 430 Scuderia.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out if an old Daihatsu Charade is the toughest car you can buy; Tom Ford drives the Honda CRV, the SUV that claims to be greener than a MINI Cooper.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith goes on a rather expensive road trip - in a £250,000 Rolls Royce Phantom. Tom Ford is testing the new Porsche Cayenne Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason drive an off-road playground, in a variety of tanks from submersible Russian machines to a British Chieftain battle tank. Tom Ford is one of the first people in the country to drive the brand new and utterly bonkers Tramontana R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of we're literally taking Fifth Gear to new heights and celebrating the most spectacular challenge petrol-heads have ever invented.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of Fifth Gear Adrian Simpson will be asking what makes a celebrity car valuable and what doesn't, and he'll be meeting the people who buy them and collect them.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which TV cop car is fastest, Jonny celebrates the 75th anniversary of the Deuce Coupe, the original Hot Rod; Tiff tests the Gumpert Apollo and Tom and Jonny build their own drift vehicles out of £600 Bedford Rascal vans.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: BBC 2's Sally Traffic, Sally Boazman, takes a chauffeur driving course; Tiff and Jason test the BMW Z4 and Nissan 350Z roadsters on the track; Jonny drives the Mini Clubman and Tom tests the sexy new Maserati Gran Turismo coupe in Italy.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which is quickest, the VW Golf GTi or Subaru Impreza WRX. Jonny proves there are still some amazing cars that you can buy for under £1500. Jason tests the Lotus Elise to find out if this is the finest car Lotus has ever produced.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford tests the brand new Ford Fiesta. Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell challenge each other on two wheels. Jonny shows us three great, affordable cars. Jason Plato takes the Porsche 911 GT2 out on the track.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tackles the horrible subject of car tax. Jason Plato meets Moto GP star James Toseland in another feature where Fifth Gear makes a sports stars dream come true. Tom Ford demonstrates the potential safety issues of convertibles.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear reconstructs one of the fastest-growing types of car crash in Britain; a terror that could turn a pleasant motorway journey into one of the most frightening rides of your life.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear will be testing three of the most economical cars on the market. There's the petrol-powered Daihatsu Charade and the diesel-powered Citroen C2 and the "hybrid" Toyota Prius.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff indulges in an end of term treat a classic Fifth Gear shootout, featuring some classic hot hatches from the 1980s. Tim investigates the great diesel versus petrol debate. Jonny visits his idea of automotive hell at the Firecracker Banger meet.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson road tests the new Hyundai Coupé. It was massively praised by motoring journalists on its launch it Italy. They even likened the £14,000 South Korean car to a mini Ferrari 456.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason tests a brand new model from British track-car specialists Westfield. Tiff has rounded up the newest American muscle cars. Guest presenter Robert Llewellyn heads to Portugal to test a revolutionary electric car from Nissan.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff races the Peugeot RCZ Coupe against its Volkswagen Scirocco rival, Jonny heads to Germany to find out if the new Nissan Juke crossover is as bonkers as it looks, Vicki tests the Honda CR-Z which claims to be the world's first sporty hybrid.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson heads to the German HQ of the Dakar rally winning Mini X-Raid team, to experience the three toughest jobs in motorsport. She'll learn how to be a navigator, mechanic and driver before taking on Dakar rally legend Nani Roma

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff pits the 260bhp Volkswagen Golf R against the SEAT Leon Cupra R in a hyper hatch shootout, Vicki speaks to top car designer Gordon Murray about his latest city car project and Tiff and Jonny enter the gruelling Ilkley Trial rally in Yorkshire.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests a new estate car from Ferrari, Vicki Butler-Henderson puts two luxurious diesels saloons against each other on the track.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason experiences a cutting edge Formula One driving simulator, Tiff races 2 four wheel drive saloons head to head and Vicki gets behind the wheel of the multi-million pound Aston Martin DB5 as driven by James Bond in Goldfinger.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff talks to David Coulthard about the new Mercedes SLS AMG, Jason heads to Italy to drive the cutting edge £300,000 Ferrari 599 GTO. Jonny meets up with Vicki for a dogfight between the Land Rover Discovery and brand-new Toyota Land Cruiser.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Jonny Smith pit two brand new four door supercars head to head at the track - Mercedes CLS63AMG versus Porsche Panamera GTS. Jason heads to the Netherlands to drive what could be the maddest supercar of the year
